question: List all papers authored by 'Han Xiao'.
answer: The provided data shows one paper authored (at least in part) by Han Xiao: "Fashion-MNIST: a Novel Image Dataset for Benchmarking Machine Learning Algorithms" (2017).  There is no information in the results to indicate if this is the only paper authored by Han Xiao.
generated_query:
MATCH (a:Author)-[:AUTHORED]->(p:Paper) WHERE a.name = 'Han Xiao' RETURN p
